Backstory.title: policeman
Backstory.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] kept the peace as a line officer in a municipal police force. \n[PAWN_pronoun] was trained in de-escalation, physical control, shooting, and other police skills.

Backstory.Title: chef
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran a high-class restaurant. [PAWN_pronoun] was famous among patrons for [PAWN_possessive] creative culinary specialties, and infamous among kitchen workers for [PAWN_possessive] casual disdain for grunt work.

Backstory.Title: housemate
Backstory.BaseDesc: As an adult, [PAWN_nameDef] kept house and cared for children while [PAWN_possessive] spouse worked.

Backstory.Title: inventor
Backstory.BaseDesc: On [PAWN_possessive] homeworld, [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a moderately successful inventor. [PAWN_pronoun] developed several minor technologies.

Backstory.Title: teacher
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was educated in the liberal arts and taught at a public school. [PAWN_pronoun] was widely knowledgeable and well-liked by [PAWN_possessive] students.

Backstory.Title: civil servant
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a low-ranking administrator for a moribund government bureaucracy. [PAWN_pronoun] is most at home filling out complicated paperwork and playing office politics.

Backstory.Title: bartender
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a bartender in a seedy establishment. The job was one part drink-mixing, one part diplomacy, and one part head-bashing.

Backstory.Title: conceptual artist
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was well-known in art circles on [PAWN_possessive] home world for [PAWN_possessive] unique and creative conceptual artworks.\n\nNobody was sure exactly what [PAWN_pronoun] was trying to communicate, but [PAWN_possessive] pieces were highly valued by collectors.

Backstory.Title: evangelist
Backstory.BaseDesc: As a youth, [PAWN_nameDef] experienced a religious awakening. [PAWN_pronoun] decided to spend the rest of [PAWN_possessive] life spreading the word of [PAWN_possessive] deity, the beauty of its culture, and its unusual medical tradition.

Backstory.Title: ascetic priest
Backstory.BaseDesc: After taking a vow of silence, [PAWN_nameDef] joined a monastery to spend [PAWN_possessive] days in quiet contemplation.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] found happiness growing vegetables in the garden and making cheese in the monastery cellars.

Backstory.Title: escaped convict
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] denies involvement in the crimes that brought about [PAWN_possessive] incarceration in a brutal penal colony. [PAWN_pronoun] escaped by tunneling beneath the perimeter using modified cutlery.

Backstory.Title: nurse
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a hospital, doing routine work such as changing bandages and taking temperatures.\n\nIt was a busy job, but [PAWN_pronoun] could always find time for a chat with a patient.

Backstory.Title: house servant
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a domestic servant to wealthy homeowners.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] got to know the kitchens and basements of [PAWN_possessive] master's mansion well, but never did any work outside.

Backstory.Title: bodyguard
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] protected whoever paid [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_pronoun] gained proficiency in many different combat forms, and was known for [PAWN_possessive] ruthlessness against those who crossed [PAWN_objective].

Backstory.Title: mathematician
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] did mathematical research at a university.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] spent much of [PAWN_possessive] spare time immersed in shooting simulations, though [PAWN_pronoun] was frequently ridiculed by other players for [PAWN_possessive] terrible aim.

Backstory.Title: paramedic
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s job was to respond rapidly to medical emergencies. [PAWN_pronoun] is used to dealing with severe injuries with only limited medical supplies.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] treated so many gunshot wounds over the years that even seeing a gun made [PAWN_objective] uncomfortable.

Backstory.Title: gardener
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked at the mansion of a powerful family, tending the lavish gardens as part of a team of servants.

Backstory.Title: torturer
Backstory.BaseDesc: Working for a tyrannical dictator, [PAWN_nameDef] earned a reputation as an expert in 'persuasion.' Any prisoner who went down into the dungeons left with no secrets - and with [PAWN_nameDef]'s smile scarred permanently into their nightmares.

Backstory.Title: defector
Backstory.BaseDesc: Early in [PAWN_possessive] adulthood, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to leave the oppressive dictatorship where [PAWN_pronoun] lived. [PAWN_possessive] defection was not well-received, and agents were sent out after [PAWN_objective].\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] spent years on the run, treating [PAWN_possessive] own wounds so no doctor could betray [PAWN_objective]. The ordeal made [PAWN_objective] bitter and untrusting.

Backstory.Title: construction engineer
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a construction worker. [PAWN_pronoun] lead a team which built everything from office blocks to cathedrals.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] busy job and numerous nearby fast-food outlets meant [PAWN_pronoun] never cooked for [PAWN_objective]self.

Backstory.Title: rancher
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] owned and operated a successful ranch where [PAWN_pronoun] raised animals for meat and wool.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] refused to do any dumb labour [PAWN_pronoun] could pay someone else to do for [PAWN_objective].

Backstory.Title: low-wage worker
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked a variety of casual jobs to support [PAWN_possessive] family, gaining a set of basic hands-on skills.

Backstory.Title: model
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] modelled clothes and jewellery for advertisers, and was also used as a physical blueprint for characters in virtual reality simulations.

Backstory.Title: geologist
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked with miners and cave-diggers, identifying rock types and natural formations.\n\nDuring [PAWN_possessive] years underground [PAWN_pronoun] also gained experience repairing drilling machines and other technical equipment.

Backstory.Title: jailbird
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] life in prisons, where [PAWN_pronoun] was put to work in the kitchens. [PAWN_pronoun] had a habit of getting into fights, and developed an aggressive way of speaking.

Backstory.Title: actor
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] travelled with a company of actors, playing to packed theatres and loving audiences everywhere. [PAWN_pronoun] was a perfectionist, and made [PAWN_possessive] own props and costumes rather than use the ones [PAWN_pronoun] was given.

Backstory.Title: veterinarian
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] treated sick and injured animals for a living. Seeing their suffering affected [PAWN_possessive] stance on the practice of eating meat, and for many years [PAWN_pronoun] lived as a vegetarian.

Backstory.Title: explosives expert
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an explosive engineer employed in mines. [PAWN_pronoun] took [PAWN_possessive] job very seriously and was well-versed in the technicalities - so much so that [PAWN_pronoun] refused to demean [PAWN_objective]self by helping with the clean-up once [PAWN_possessive] carefully-calculated explosion was complete.

Backstory.Title: counselor
Backstory.BaseDesc: A terrifying trauma when [PAWN_nameDef] was a young adult caused [PAWN_objective] to develop a serious eating disorder. With counseling [PAWN_pronoun] learned to have a healthier relationship with food, and decided to put [PAWN_possessive] new skills to use helping others overcome their emotional problems.

Backstory.Title: recruiter
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a revered order of martial artists, infamous both for their skill in combat and for their practice of refusing to treat their wounded.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] travelled [PAWN_possessive] homeworld, judging the young people [PAWN_pronoun] met to determine if they might be suitable for training.

Backstory.Title: drifter
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] never figured out what to do with [PAWN_possessive] life. [PAWN_pronoun] travelled often, taking up casual work wherever [PAWN_pronoun] found it.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] also occasionally worked on a novel that [PAWN_pronoun] knew would be a bestseller - just as soon as [PAWN_pronoun] could find a publisher who was interested.

Backstory.Title: machine collector
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was obsessed with old machines and arcane pieces of technology. [PAWN_pronoun] obtained them wherever [PAWN_pronoun] could, and loved taking them apart to see how they worked.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] had a habit of talking about [PAWN_possessive] collection long after people around [PAWN_objective] had stopped listening.

Backstory.Title: con artist
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] never created anything in [PAWN_possessive] life. [PAWN_pronoun] did, however, prove to be a natural at getting others to give [PAWN_objective] what they had created.
